command.name: 3x3
command.description: Automatically crops and creates a 3x3 collage for you.

command.name: myfav
command.description: Used to save collages of your favorite multimedia. Available topics are `games, books, movies, shows, anime, music, mix, pokemon`. Additional options are `list, remove`. To register your favorite games, you add `-myfav <topic>` as a comment to your collage. Use `-myfav <topic> @<user>` to see their collage. Use `-myfav <topic> remove` to remove your collage. Use `-myfav <topic> list` to list all users that have added collages to this topic. Use `-myfav @<user> list` to list all favorites a user has already added.

command.name: suggest
command.description: Used to give the bot developer suggestions on possible features/updates.

command.name: lockkasino
command.description: Admin-only. Locks the current karma kasino, so that no new bets can be made.

command.name: openkasino
command.description: Admin-only. Creates new karma kasino for people to bet in. Doesn't work if there is an instance of a casino already open somewhere.

command.name: closekasino
command.description: Admin-only. Closes last instance of the karma kasino. Pass 1 for option 1 to win, pass 2 for option 2 to win and pass 3 to cancel and refund.

command.name: refreshkasino
command.description: Admin-only. Used to renew karma kasino to a new message, so that people see it again. Doing this manually avoids clutter and spam.

command.name: bet
command.description: Bets the specified amount of karma in the current karma kasino on the specified option. If your option wins, you receive your karma back, including a proportional amount of karma bet on the opposite option. You may use 'all' instead of a number to bet all your karma. Gamba! :game_die:

command.name: help
command.description: Returns list of commands or specific instructions on the command specified by `<command>`

command.name: ping
command.description: Returns the latency of the bot.

command.name: source
command.description: Returns basic information about the bot.

command.name: echo
command.description: For debug purposes. Returns exactly the message you pass through.

command.name: drumpf
command.description: Returns a tweet from the President of the United States with whatever you passed through `<text>`

command.name: karma
command.description: Returns the amount of post and link karma of yourself, or, if passed in `<user>`, the karma of the specified user. Every time you get a :this: or :that: reaction on one of your messages on this server, you gain karma. If you posted purely text, you receive post karma and otherwise link karma. Use `-karma lb` to print karma leaderboards of the server.

command.name: postlb
command.description: Returns the top voted messages of all time and this week.

command.name: meme
command.description: Given an image url (.jpg and .png only), a top text and a bottom text, returns an impact meme. You must use `""` to provide text with multiple words. Per text there is a 120 character limit.

command.name: checkpost
command.description: Admin-only. Updates the post-data for top post with a given message_id and channel_id

command.name: wiretransfer
command.description: This command sends the amount of karma specified to the user specified. Use 'all' instead of a number to send all your karma.
